title: Flarebyte.com Ltd | Scalable web applications within deadlines
keywords: software development, web application, Java, Python, London, Java Enterprise,Java EE, Django, mobile devices, scalable
description: Flarebyte.com Ltd develops web applications based on Java Enterprise or the Django Python framework
billboard: Development of scalable web applications within deadlines
deck: Flarebyte.com Ltd is a start-up specialized in the development of web applications
main: At the moment, we are proposing services only around the Java Enterprise stack and the Django Python framework but this should evolve in a wider offer in the future.
At some point, we consider that focusing on all the different aspects of one technology is the key to success. We try to pay a lot of attention on details, including design, scalability and security.
